function.name: forward_messages
function.description: Forwards the given messages to the specified entity.

entity.description: To which entity the message(s) will be forwarded.

from_peer.description: If the given messages are integer IDs and not instances of the Message class, this must be specified in order for the forward to work. This parameter indicates the entity from which the messages should be forwarded.

silent.description: Whether the message should notify people in a broadcast channel or not. Defaults to False, which means it will notify them. Set it to True to alter this behaviour.
